name: TripAdvisor Declutter
description: Hides advertising and unnecessary clutter on the Trip Advisor sites Also increases Forum pages text width / reducing sidebar width, plus numerous minor tweaks (see additional info below). CSS contains commentary to assist users to tailor changes to personal preference. Style may not work with older browser that don't support Flex box.
additional_info:
To hide additional sections or reshow hidden elements edit the style from the Stylish menu. Find the entry in style using the comments to help locate it, To hide an element change to display: none, To show an element change from display: none to display:initial or display: inherit (whichever works best).

If you see any problems try disabling the style form the Stylish menu and restarting your browser (sometimes parts of styles linger after disabling)

Report any problems found or suggestions using the comment facility on this page of by using the Tripadvisor Private Message system to send a message to Mymsman.
